TopicTitle: The Planets: a Suite of 3D Renderings by Interplanet Janet

Articles.Content:
Everyone knows the Planets Suite of Classical Music... I think. Well, I've decided to make some 3D Renderings using nothing but Blender Render!

The eleven-planet compilation features all major planets and three dwarf planets. Check it out for yourself?

5ejfr

Edited July 12, 2015 by Interplanet Janet
